reporter_caption.center: R.G. RUTHERFORD CONTRACTORS v. KIRCHER, 261 Pa. Super. 589 (1978)

caption.center: R.G. Rutherford Contractors, Inc. v. Kircher et al., Appellants et al.

opinion.posture: Assumpsit. Before BODLEY, J., without a jury. Finding entered in favor of plaintiff and against all defendants and order entered dismissing defendants' exceptions. Individual defendants appealed. Appeal, No. 1008, Oct. T., 1977, from Court of Common Pleas of Bucks County, No. 74-5742-04-1. Submitted September 29, 1977.
opinion.attorneys: Edward D. Foy, Jr., for appellants; Richard D. Link, for appellee, R.G. Rutherford Contractors, Inc.; John A. Van Luvanee, for appellee, General Investment and Development Co., Inc.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed.
WATKINS, former P.J., and HOFFMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
